questions.onset: When did the dizziness start? Was it sudden or gradual?
questions.duration: How long have you been experiencing dizziness? (e.g., hours, days, weeks)
questions.pattern: Is the dizziness constant or does it come and go?
questions.severity: On a scale of 1-10, how severe is your dizziness?
questions.type: What type of dizziness is it? Does the room spin (vertigo), or do you feel lightheaded/unsteady?
questions.triggers: What triggers the dizziness? (e.g., standing up, head movement, position change)
questions.associated_symptoms: Do you have any of these symptoms along with dizziness: hearing loss, ringing in ears, nausea, vomiting, headache, weakness, vision changes, chest pain, palpitations, confusion, sweating?
questions.recent_head_injury: Have you had any recent head injury or trauma?

triage_rules.expression: ('weakness' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'vision' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'confusion' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()) and 'sudden' in str(onset).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Possible stroke or TIA - Neurological emergency requiring immediate care

triage_rules.expression: ('chest' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'palpitations' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()) and int(str(severity).split('/')[0] if '/' in str(severity) else severity) >= 7
triage_rules.reason: Possible cardiac cause - Requires urgent evaluation
Post-traumatic dizziness - Needs medical evaluation for head injury assessment

triage_rules.expression: ('hearing' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'ringing' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'tinnitus' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()) and int(str(severity).split('/')[0] if '/' in str(severity) else severity) >= 7
triage_rules.reason: Possible vestibular disorder (e.g., Meniere's disease) - Needs evaluation within 24-48 hours
Possible Benign Paroxysmal Positional Vertigo (BPPV) - Schedule appointment with healthcare provider or ENT specialist

triage_rules.expression: int(str(severity).split('/')[0] if '/' in str(severity) else severity) <= 6
triage_rules.reason: Mild to moderate dizziness - Medical evaluation recommended

default_triage.reason: Dizziness evaluation needed - Schedule appointment with healthcare provider
